page.title:
CA Buffering
CA Buffering
page.normal_text:
• “All requests which require interaction with a CA server are accumulated (buffered) and not forwarded to the IOC until one of ca_flush_io(), ca_pend_io(), ca_pend_event(), ca_sg_pend() are called allowing several operation to be efficiently sent over the network in one message.”

page.normal_text:
[savage@d0ol30 ~]$ setup d0online [savage@d0ol30 ~]$ python Python 2.1 (#3, May 16 2001, 15:15:15) [GCC 2.95.2 19991024 (release)] on linux2 Type "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information. >>> from CaChannel import * >>> ch = CaChannel('catest') >>> ch.searchw() >>> ch.putw(123.456) >>> ch.getw() 123.456

try:
try:

catest = CaChannel('catest') catest.searchw() catest.putw(123.456) print catest.getw()
catest = CaChannel('catest')
catest.searchw()
catest.putw(123.456)
print catest.getw()

except CaChannelException, status:
except CaChannelException, status:

print ca.message(status)
print ca.message(status)

page.title:
Synchronous I/O
Synchronous I/O
page.normal_text:
>>> >>> ch.search() >>> ch.pend_io() >>> >>> ch.array_put(123.456) >>> ch.pend_io() >>> >>> ch.array_get() >>> ch.pend_io() >>> ch.getValue() 123.456
>>>
>>> ch.search()
>>> ch.pend_io()
>>>
>>> ch.array_put(123.456)
>>> ch.pend_io()
>>>
>>> ch.array_get()
>>> ch.pend_io()
>>> ch.getValue()
123.456

>>> ch.getw() 123.456 >>> ch.getw(ca.DBR_INT) 123 >>> ch.getw(ca.DBR_STRING) '123' >>> ch.field_type() 6 >>>ca.dbr_text(ch.field_type()) 'DBR_DOUBLE‘ >>>
>>> ch.getw()
123.456
>>> ch.getw(ca.DBR_INT)
123
>>> ch.getw(ca.DBR_STRING)
'123'
>>> ch.field_type()
6
>>>ca.dbr_text(ch.field_type())
'DBR_DOUBLE‘
>>>

>>> scan.searchw()
>>> scan.getw()
6
>>> scan.getw(ca.DBR_STRING)
'1 second'
>>> scan.putw(5)
>>> scan.getw(ca.DBR_STRING)
'2 second‘
>>> ca.dbr_text(scan.field_type())
'DBR_ENUM'
>>>

• No waiting for CA requests to complete • A user written callback function is executed when the request has completed • ca_pend_event = flush the request buffer and wait for timeout or until all CA background activity is processed • ca_poll = ca_pend_event with a short • ca_flush_io = flush the request buffer • No waiting for CA requests to complete • A user written callback function is executed when the request has completed
